description: This cluster is for assigning artifacts tags that are just below the level of strategic language, but above the terminology used at the tactical level of cybersecurity.  This cluster in particular aligns to terminology used to describe intentional nefarious threats to cybersecurity.
name: NEFARIOUS-THREAT
source: The HITRUST Threat Catalogue v1 and the ENISA Threat Taxonomy

values.description: Using authorized access to perform illegitimate actions.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Operational Framework: HITRUST TC LIN1 Abuse of authorizations
